title: How to Make a Cell Phone Wire Tap

steps.title: Auto answer is when someone calls the number and it automatically answers without ringing.
steps.content: Auto answer is when someone calls the number and it automatically answers without ringing. The location of this option vary by cell phone.

steps.title: Leave the headphones attached while your phone is on the charger.
steps.content: Leave the headphones attached while your phone is on the charger. This way, if you make a noise on the other end of the phone, it will be a tiny/very unnoticed noise.

steps.title: The phone should be charging near where the conversation is going to happen.
steps.content: The phone should be charging near where the conversation is going to happen. You can leave the phone face down so nobody suspects anything, but it's better to hide it behind plants or somewhere inconspicuous.

steps.title: Don't act like you're up to something.
steps.content: Don't act like you're up to something. If you have a suspicious expression on your face, then people may think something is going on.

steps.title: When you dial the phone number, the phone will answer automatically.
steps.content: When you dial the phone number, the phone will answer automatically. Since nobody will hear it ring, nobody will know you're listening.

steps.title: You can now hear the conversation.
steps.content: You can now hear the conversation. Try to stay quiet, and be especially careful not to press any buttons on the phone that could be loud enough for others to hear through the headphones.
